title: Rubens, Rembrandt, and Drawing in the Golden Age
short_description: Featuring works by Rembrandt, Rubens, and many others, this exhibition traces the story of drawing in 17th-century Netherlands, exploring its many roles in artistic training, its preparatory function, and its eventual emergence as an independent medium.
